cast.name: 肖恩·派特里克·弗兰纳里 Sean Patrick Flanery

writer.name: 乔纳森·汉斯雷 Jonathan Hensleigh

this_title: The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: The Trenches of Hell
trans_title: 少年印第安纳琼斯大冒险：堑壕地狱
introduction: August, 1917. Using the name 'Henri Defense', 17 year old Indiana Jones has enlisted in the Belgian army to fight in the Great War. After all his commanding officers have been wiped out during combat in Flanders, Corporal 'Defense' is left in charge of what's left of the 9th Belgian Infantry. They are assigned to the French 14th Company and dispatched into the Battle of the Somme. When Indy is captured by the Germans, he quickly gains a reputation as an escape artist, and is sent to the maximum security prison at Dunsterstadt on the Danube
chinese_title: 少年印第安纳琼斯大冒险：堑壕地狱
foreign_title: The Adventures of Young Indiana Jones: The Trenches of Hell
